channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Methanol glass bottle cap, found inside trl DescribePack: cracked bottle cap, loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed inside hazmate tote, with lid

item.title: Report X-2023110751
item.description:
Report X-2023110751

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-03
  • City: BATON ROUGE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Manager notified QA person about leaking hazmat in unload area. Hazmat box was placed in a red hazardous tote and moved to hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: After inspecting hazmat box all plastic bottles had loose caps which caused a small amount of liquid to spill out into box. Liquid was spilled on sides and bottom of box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat package was placed into a red hazardous tote and moved to hazmat cage for inspection. After inspecting damaged box was placed into a yellow drum for preparation to next hub for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2023110608
item.description:
Report X-2023110608

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: COVINGTON
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came off trailer from DALL and was found already completely leaked out. DescribePack: Entire side of drum was flattened from some abrasion and caused the contents to leak after the drum failed. DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat damage tote.

item.title: Report X-2023110555
item.description:
Report X-2023110555

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: COVINGTON
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on trailer 98270 on it's side (orientation arrows not pointing up; proper hazmat loading techniques not utilized), box was wet displaying signs of a leakage and there was a smell of hazardous material. DescribePack: Some of the cans in the package were dented and one was leaking from a puncture/crack. All cans are soiled by the hazardous product leaking out of the damaged can. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Place package into a hazmat bin lined with a hazmat bag.
